title: Roanoke Police identify shooting suspect
content:
ROANOKE, Va. (WDBJ7) Roanoke Police are searching for a shooting suspect.
Detectives have obtained warrants for Isiah Surles, 21, of Roanoke. He’s been charged with two counts of malicious wounding, using a firearm in the commission of a felony and shooting into an occupied home. The charges relate to a shooting at a home on 13th Street in Southwest Roanoke that happened Jan. 3.
If you have any information about Surles or the shooting, please call the Roanoke Police Department’s tip line at 540-344-8500.
